words.id: Alif Lam Mim Ra||ini||ayat-ayat||kitab||dan yang||diturunkan||kepadamu||dari||Tuhanmu||benar||akan tetapi||kebanyakan||manusia||tidak||mereka beriman
words.en: Alif Laam Mim Ra||These||(are) the Verses||(of) the Book||And that which||has been revealed||to you||from||your Lord||(is) the truth||but||most||(of) the mankind||(do) not||believe

translations.text: Alif-Laaam-Meeem-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaab; wallazee unzila ilaika mir Rabbikal haqqu Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa yu'minoon

words.id: Allah||yang||meninggikan||langit(jamak)||dengan tidak/tanpa||tiang||kamu melihatnya||kemudian||Dia menuju||diatas||'Arasy||dan Dia menundukkan||matahari||dan bulan||masing-masing||beredar||hingga waktu||ditentukan||Dia mengatur||urusan||Dia menjelaskan||tanda-tanda||agar kalian||dengan pertemuan||Tuhan kalian||kamu meyakini
words.en: Allah||(is) the One Who||raised||the heavens||without||pillars||that you see||then||He established||on||the Throne||and subjected||the sun||and the moon||each||running||for a term||appointed||He arranges||the matter||He details||the Signs||so that you may||in the meeting||(with) your Lord||believe with certainty

translations.text: Allaahul lazee raf'as samaawaati bighairi amadin tarawnahaa summas tawaa 'alal Arshi Wa-sakhkharash shamsa walqamara kulluny yajree li-ajalim musammaa; yudabbirul amra yufassilil Aayaati la'allakum biliqaaa'i Rabbikum tooqinoon

words.id: dan Dia||yang||membentangkan||bumi||dan Dia menjadikan||padanya||gunung-gunung||dan sungai-sungai||dan dari||semua/setiap||buah-buahan||Dia menjadikan||padanya||berpasang-pasangan||dua||Dia menutupkan||malam||siang||sesungguhnya||pada||yang demikian||sungguh tanda-tanda||bagi kamu||mereka memikirkan
words.en: And He||(is) the One Who||spread||the earth||and placed||in it||firm mountains||and rivers||and from||all||(of) the fruits||He made||in it||pairs||two||He covers||the night||(with) the day||Indeed||in||that||surely (are) Signs||for a people||who ponder

translations.text: Wa-Huwal lazee maddal arda Wa-ja'ala feehaa rawaasiya Wa-anhaaraa; Wa-min kullis samaraati ja'ala feehaa zawjainis naini Yughshil lailan nahaar; inna fee zaalika la-aayaatil liqawmien yatafakkaroon

words.id: dan di||bumi||bagian-bagian||berdampingan||dan kebun-kebun||dari||anggur||dan tanaman-tanaman||dan pohon Kurma||bercabang||dan tidak||bercabang||disirami||dengan air||satu(sama)||dan Kami melebihkan||sebagian||atas||sebagian yang lain||dalam/tentang||rasa||sesungguhnya||pada||yang demikian||sungguh tanda-tanda||bagi kaum||mereka berfikir
words.en: And in||the earth||are tracks||neighboring||and gardens||of||grapevines||and crops||and date-palms||trees (growing) from a single root||and not||trees (growing) from a single root||watered||with water||one||but We cause to exceed||some of them||over||others||in||the fruit||Indeed||in||that||surely (are) Signs||for a people||who use reason

translations.text: Wa-fil ardi qita'um muta-jaawiraatunw Wa-jannaatum min a'naabinw Wa-zar'unw Wa-nakheelun sinwaanunw Wa-ghairu sinwaanien yusqaa bimaaa'inw waahid; Wa-nufaddilu ba'dahaa 'alaa ba'din fil ukul; inna fee zaalika la-aayaatil liqawmien ya'qiloon

words.id: dan jika||kamu herankan||maka yang mengherankan||ucapan/perkataan mereka||apakah apabila||adalah kami||tanah||apakah sesungguhnya kami||sungguh dalam||makhluk/ciptaan||baru||mereka itu||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||dengan/kepada Tuhan mereka||dan mereka itu||belenggu||pada||leher mereka||dan mereka itu||penghuni||api/neraka||mereka||didalamnya||kekal
words.en: And if||you (are) astonished||then astonishing||(is) their saying||When||we are||dust||will we||(be) indeed in||a creation||new||Those||(are) the ones who||disbelieved||in their Lord||and those||the iron chains||(will be) in||their necks||those||(are the) companions||(of) the Fire||they||in it||(will) abide forever

translations.text: Wa-in ta'jab fa'ajabun qawluhum a-izaa kunna turaaban a-inna lafee khalqin jadeed; ulaaa-'ikal lazeena kafaroo bi-Rabbihim Wa-ulaaa'ikal aghlaalu feee a'naaqihim Wa-ulaaa'ika As-haabun Naari hum feehaa khaalidoon

words.id: dan mereka minta disegerakan kepadamu||dengan keburukan/siksa||sebelum||kebaikan||dan/padahal sungguh||telah lewat/terjadi||dari||sebelum mereka||beberapa contoh||dan sesungguhnya||Tuhanmu||sungguh mempunyai||ampunan||bagi manusia||atas||kezaliman mereka||dan sesungguhnya||Tuhanmu||sungguh sangat berat||siksaan
words.en: And they ask you to hasten||the evil||before||the good||and verily||has occurred||from||before them||[the] similar punishments||And indeed||your Lord||(is) full||(of) forgiveness||for mankind||for||their wrongdoing||and indeed||your Lord||(is) severe||(in) the penalty

translations.text: Wa-yasta'jiloonaka bis-saiyi'ati qablal hasanati Wa-qad khalat min qablihimul masulaat; Wa-inna Rabbaka lazoo maghfiratil linnaasi 'alaa zulmihim Wa-inna Rabbaka lashadeedul iqaab

words.id: dan berkata||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||mengapa tidak||diturunkan||kepadanya||suatu tanda||dari||Tuhannya||sesungguhnya hanyalah||kamu||pemberi peringatan||dan bagi tiap-tiap||kaum||orang yang memberi petunjuk
words.en: And say||those who||disbelieved||Why not||has been sent down||to him||a sign||from||his Lord||Only||you||(are) a warner||and for every||people||(is) a guide

translations.text: Wa-yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo law-laaa unzila alaihi Aayatum mir Rabbih; innamaaa anta munzirunw Wa-likulli qawmin haad

words.id: Allah||Dia mengetahui||apa||yang dikandung||tiap-tiap||perempuan||dan apa||kurang sempurna||kandungan rahim||dan apa||bertambah||dan tiap-tiap/segala||sesuatu||pada sisiNya||dengan ukuran
words.en: Allah||knows||what||carries||every||female||and what||fall short||the womb||and what||they exceed||And every||thing||with Him||(is) in due proportion

translations.text: Allaahu ya'lamu maa tahmilu kullu unsaa Wa-maa tagheedul arhaamu Wa-maa tazdaad, Wa-kullu shai'in indahoo bimiqdaar

words.id: yang mengetahui||yang gaib||dan yang nampak||Maha Besar||Maha Tinggi
words.en: Knower||(of) the unseen||and the witnessed||the Most Great||the Most High

translations.text: Aalimul Ghaibi wash-shahaadatil Kaabeerul Muta'aal

words.id: sama saja||diantaramu||siapa yang||merahasiakan||perkataan/ucapan||dan siapa||nampakkan/terus terang||dengannya||dan siapa||dia||bersembunyi||di malam hari||dan berjalan||disiang hari
words.en: (It is) same (to Him)||[of you]||(one) who||conceals||the speech||or (one) who||publicizes||it||and (one) who||[he]||(is) hidden||by night||or goes freely||by day

translations.text: Sawaaa'um minkum man asarral qawla Wa-man jahara bihee Wa-man huwa mustakhfim billaili Wa-saaribum binnahaar

words.id: baginya(seseorang)||pengiring||dari||antara||dua tangannya/depannya||dan dari||belakangnya||mereka menjaganya||dari/atas||perintah||Allah||sesungguhnya||Allah||tidak||merobah||apa/keadaan||dengan suatu kaum||sehingga||mereka merobah||apa/keadaan||dengan diri mereka sendiri||dan jika||menghendaki||Allah||dengan suatu kaum||keburukan||maka tidak||menolak||baginya||dan tidak ada||bagi mereka||dari||selain Dia||dari||pelindung
words.en: For him||(are) successive (Angels)||from||(before)||(him)||and from||and behind him||who guard him||by||(the) command||(of) Allah||Indeed||Allah||(does) not||change||(the condition)||of a people||until||they change||what||(is) in themselves||And when||wills||Allah||for a people||misfortune||then (there is) no||turning away||of it||and not||for them||from||besides Him||any||protector

translations.text: Lahoo mu'aqqibaatum mim baini yadaihi Wa-min khalfihee yahfazoonahoo min amril laah; innal laaha laa yughaiyyiru maa biqawmin hattaa yughaiyiroo maa bianfusihim; Wa-izaaa araadal laahu biqawmin sooo'an falaa maradda lah; Wa-maa lahum min doonihee minw waal

words.id: Dia-lah||yang||memperlihatkan kepadamu||kilat||ketakutan||dan harapan||dan Dia mengadakan||awan||tebal/mendung
words.en: He||(is) the One Who||shows you||the lightning||a fear||and a hope||and brings up||the clouds||the heavy

translations.text: Huwal lazee yureekumul barqa khawfanw Wa-tama'anw Wa-yunshi'us sahaabas siqaal

words.id: dan bertasbih||guruh||dengan memujiNya||dan Malaikat||dari/karena||takut kepadaNya||dan Dia melepaskan||halilintar||maka/lalu mengenai||dengannya||siapa||Dia kehendaki||dan/namun mereka||mereka berbantah-bantah||tentang||Allah||dan Dia||amat/Maha Keras||siksa
words.en: And glorifies||the thunder||[with] His praise||and the Angels||for||fear of Him||And He sends||the thunderbolts||and strikes||with it||whom||He wills||yet they||dispute||about||Allah||And He||(is) Mighty||(in) Strength

translations.text: Wa-yusabbihur ra'du bihamdihee walmalaaa'ikatu min kheefatihee Wa-yursilus sawaa'iqa fa-yuseebu bihaa mai yashaaa'u Wa-hum yujaadiloona fil laahi Wa-Huwa shadeedul mihaal

words.id: bagi Dia Allah||doa/permintaan||benar||dan berhala-berhala||mereka menyembah||dari||selain Dia/Allah||tidak||mereka dapat memperkenankan||bagi mereka||dengan sesuatu||melainkan||seperti orang yang membuka||kedua telapak tangannya||kedalam||air||supaya sampai||mulutnya||dan/padahal tidaklah||ia||sampai kepadanya/mulutnya||dan tidaklah||doa||orang-orang kafir||kecuali/hanyalah||dalam||kesesatan/sia-sia
words.en: To Him||(is) supplication||(of) the truth||And those whom||they invoke||besides Him||besides Him||not||they respond||to them||with a thing||except||like one who stretches||his hands||towards||water||to reach||his mouth||but not||it||reaches it||And not||(is) the supplication||(of) the disbelievers||but||in||error

translations.text: Lahoo da'watul haqq; wallazeena yad'oona min doonihee laa yastajeeboona lahum bishai'in illaa kabaasiti kaffaihi ilal maaa'i liyablugha faahu Wa-maa huwa bibaalighih; Wa-maa du'aaa'ul kaafireena illaa fee dalaal

words.id: dan kepada Allah||bersujud||siap/apa||di||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||taat/atas kemauan sendiri||dan terpaksa||dan bayang-bayang mereka||diwaktu pagi||dan petang
words.en: And to Allah||prostrates||whoever||(is) in||the heavens||and the earth||willingly||or unwillingly||and (so do) their shadows||in the mornings||and in the afternoons

translations.text: Wa-lillaahi yasjudu man fis samaawaati wal-ardi taw-'anw Wa-karhanw Wa-zilaaluhum bilghuduwwi wal-aasaal

words.id: katakanlah||siapa||Tuhan||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||katakanlah||Allah||katakanlah||patutkah kamu mengambil||dari||selain Dia/Allah||pelindung-pelindung||tidak||mereka mnguasai||bagi diri mereka sendiri||kemanfaatan||dan tidak||kemudaratan||katakanlah||apakah||sama||orang buta||dan orang yang dapat melihat||atau||apakah||sama||gelap gulita||dan cahaya/terang benderang||atau||mereka menjadikan||bagi Allah||beberapa sekutu||mereka menciptakan||seperti ciptaanNya||maka/lalu serupa||ciptaan||atas mereka||katakanlah||Allah||pencipta||segala||sesuatu||dan Dia||Maha Esa||Maha Perkasa
words.en: Say||Who||(is) the Lord||(of) the heavens||and the earth||Say||Allah||Say||Have you then taken||from||besides Him||protectors||not||they have power||for themselves||(to) benefit||and not||(to) harm||Say||Is||equal||the blind||and the seeing||Or||is||equal||the darkness[es]||and the light||Or||they attribute||to Allah||partners||who created||like His creation||so that seemed alike||the creation||to them||Say||Allah||(is) the Creator||of all||things||and He||(is) the One||the Irresistible

translations.text: Qul mar Rabbus samaawaati wal-ard; qulil laah; qul afattakhaztum min dooniheee awliyaaa'a laa yamlikoona li-anfusihim naf'anw Wa-laa darraa; qul hal yastawil a'maa wal-baseeru am hal tastawiz zulumaatu wannoor; am ja'aloo lillaahi shurakaaa'a khalaqoo kakhalqihee fatashaa-bahal khalqu alaihim; qulil laahu Khaaliqu kulli shai'inw Wa-Huwal Waahidul Qahhar

words.id: (Allah)telah menurunkan||dari||langit||air||maka mengalirlah ia||lembah-lembah||dengan/menurut ukurannya||maka membawa||arus||buih||mengembang||dan dari apa||mereka bakar/lembur||atasnya||dalam||api||mencari/membuat||perhiasan||atau||kesenangan/alat-alat||buih||sepertinya(buih arus)||demikianlah||membuat||Allah||benar||dan bathil||maka adapun||buih||maka akan hilang||tak berharga||dan adapun||apa||memberi manfaat||manusia||maka ia tetap||di||bumi||demikianlah||membuat||Allah||perumpamaan-perumpamaan
words.en: He sends down||from||the sky||water||and flows||the valleys||according to their measure||and carries||the torrent||a foam||rising||And from what||they heat||[on] it||in||the fire||in order to make||ornaments||or||utensils||a foam||like it||Thus||sets forth||Allah||the truth||and the falsehood||Then as for||the foam||it passes away||(as) scum||and as for||what||benefits||the mankind||remains||in||the earth||Thus||Allah sets forth||Allah sets forth||the examples

translations.text: Anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fasaalat awdiyatum biqadarihaa fahtamalas sailu zabadar raabiyaa; Wa-mimmmaa yooqidoona alaihi fin naarib tighaaa'a bilyatin aw mataa'in zabadum misluh; kazaalika yadribul laahul haqqa wal-baatil; fa-ammaz zabadu fa-yazhabu jufaaa'aa; Wa-ammaa maa yanfa'un naasa fa-yamkusu fil ard; kazaalika yadribul laahul amsaal

words.id: bagi orang-orang yang||mereka memenuhi seruan||bagi Tuhan mereka||pembalasan yang baik||dan orang-orang||tidak||mereka memenuhi panggilan||bagiNya||jikalau||bahwasanya/bahwa||bagi mereka||apa||di||bumi||semuanya||dan seperti/sebanyak||besertanya||niscaya mereka menebus||dengannya||mereka itu||bagi mereka||seburuk-buruk||hisab/perhitungan||dan tempat kediaman mereka||jahanam||dan seburuk-buruk||tempat kembali
words.en: For those who||responded||to their Lord||(is) the bliss||And for those who||(did) not||respond||to Him||if||that||they had||whatever||(is) in||the earth||all||and like of it||with it||surely they would offer ransom||with it||Those||for them||(is) a terrible||reckoning||and their abode||(is) Hell||and wretched||(is) the resting place

translations.text: Lillazeenas tajaaboo lirabbihimul husnaa; wallazeena lam yastajeeboo lahoo law anna lahum maa fil ardi jamee'anw Wa-mislahoo ma'ahoo laftadaw bih; ulaaa'ika lahum sooo'ul hisaab; Wa-ma'waahum Jahannamu Wa-bi'sal mihaad

words.id: apakah orang||mengetahui||bahwasanya||diturunkan||kepadamu||dari||Tuhanmu||benar||seperti orang||dia||buta||sesungguhnya hanyalah||mengambil pelajaran||yang mempunyai||akal/berakal
words.en: Then is (he) who||knows||that which||has been revealed||to you||from||your Lord||(is) the truth||like (one) who||[he]||(is) blind||Only||pay heed||men||(of) understanding

translations.text: Afamai ya'lamu annamaaa unzila ilaika mir Rabbikal haqqu kaman huwa a'maa; innamaa yatazakkaru ulul albaab

words.id: orang-orang yang||(mereka)memenuhi||dengan janji||Allah||dan tidak||mereka merusak||perjanjian
words.en: Those who||fulfill||the covenant||(of) Allah||and not||they break||the contract

translations.text: Allazeena yoofoona bi'ahdil laahi Wa-laa yanqu-doonal meesaaq

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||(mereka)menghubungkan||apa||memerintahkan||Allah||dengannya||supaya||dihubungkan||dan mereka takut||Tuhan mereka||dan mereka takut||seburuk-buruk||hisab/perhitungan
words.en: And those who||join||what||(has been) commanded||(by) Allah||[for it]||to||be joined||and fear||their Lord||and are afraid||(of) the evil||the account

translations.text: Wallazeena yasiloona maaa amaral laahu bihee ai yoosala Wa-yakhshawna Rabbahum Wa-yakhaafoona sooo'al hisaab

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||(mereka)bersabar||mencari||wajah/keridhaan||Tuhan mereka||dan mereka mendirikan||sholat||dan mereka menafkahkan||dari sebagian apa||Kami beri rezki mereka||sembunyi||dan terang-terangan||dan mereka menolak||dengan kebaikan||kejahatan||mereka itu||bagi mereka||kesudahan||tempat
words.en: And those who||(are) patient||seeking||(the) Face||(of) their Lord||and establish||the prayer||and spend||from what||We have provided them||secretly||and publicly||and they repel||with the good||the evil||those||for them||(is) the final attainment||(of) the Home

translations.text: Wallazeena sabarub tighaaa'a Wajhi Rabbihim Wa-aqaamus Salaata Wa-anfaqoo mimmaa razaqnaahum sirranw Wa-'alaaniyatanw Wa-yadra'oona bilhasanatis saiyi'ata ulaaa'ika lahum 'uqbad daar

words.id: sorga||'Aden||masuk kedalamnya||dan orang||berbuat baik/saleh||dari||bapak-bapak mereka||dan isteri-isteri mereka||dan anak cucu mereka||dan para malaikat||mereka masuk||atas mereka||dari||tiap-tiap/semua||pintu-pintu
words.en: Gardens||of Eden||they will enter them||and whoever||(were) righteous||among||their fathers||and their spouses||and their offsprings||And the Angels||will enter||upon them||from||every||gate

translations.text: Jannaatu adnien yadkhu-loonahaa Wa-man salaha min aabaaa'ihim Wa-azwaajihim Wa-zurriyyaatihim walmalaaa'i-katu yadkhuloona alaihim min kulli baab

words.id: keselamatan||atas kalian||dengan apa/sebab||kesabaranmu||maka alangkah nikmatnya/baiknya||kesudahan||tempat
words.en: (Saying) Peace||(be) upon you||for what||you patiently endured||And excellent||(is) the final attainment||(of) the Home

translations.text: Salaamun alaikum bimaa sabartum; fani'ma 'uqbad daar

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||(mereka)merusak||janji||Allah||dari||sesudah||diikrarkan dengan teguh||dan mereka memutuskan||apa||yang diperintahkan||Allah||dengannya||supaya||dihubungkan||dan mereka membuat kerusakan||di||bumi||mereka itu||bagi  mereka||kutukan||dan bagi mereka||seburuk-buruk||tempat/kediaman
words.en: And those who||break||the covenant||(of) Allah||from||after||contracting it||and sever||what||(has been) commanded||(by) Allah||for it||to||be joined||and spread corruption||in||the earth||Those||for them||(is) the curse||and for them||(is) an evil||home

translations.text: Wallazeena yanqudoona 'Ahdal laahi mim ba'di meesaaqihee Wa-yaqta'oona maaa amaral laahu biheee ai yoosala Wa-yufsidoona fil ardi ulaaa'ika lahumul la'natu Wa-lahum sooo'ud daar

words.id: Allah||melapangkan/meluaskan||rezki||bagi siapa||Dia kehendaki||dan Dia menyempitkan||dan mereka bergembira||dengan kehidupan||dunia||dan/padahal||kehidupan||dunia||dalam||kehidupan akhirat||hanyalah||kesenangan
words.en: Allah||extends||the provision||for whom||He wills||and restricts||And they rejoice||in the life||(of) the world||and nothing||(is) the life||of the world||in (comparison to)||the Hereafter||except||an enjoyment

translations.text: Allaahu yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdir; Wa-farihoo bilhayaatid dunyaa Wa-mal hayaatud dunya fil Aakhirati illaa mataa'

words.id: dan berkata||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||mengapa tidak||diturunkan||atasnya||suatu ayat||dari||Tuhannya||katakanlah||sesungguhnya||Allah||Dia menyesatkan||siapa||Dia kehendaki||dan Dia memberi petunjuk||kepadaNya||siapa||berbuat/kembali
words.en: And say||those who||disbelieved||Why has not||been sent down||upon him||a Sign||from||his Lord||Say||Indeed||Allah||lets go astray||whom||He wills||and guides||to Himself||whoever||turns back

translations.text: Wa-yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo law-laaa unzila alaihi Aayatum mir Rabbih; qul innal laaha yudillu maien yashaa'u Wa-yahdeee ilaihi man anaab

words.id: orang-orang yang||(mereka)beriman||dan menjadi tenteram||hati mereka||dengan mengingat||Allah||ingatlah||dengan mengingat||Allah||menjadi tenteram||hati
words.en: Those who||believed||and find satisfaction||their hearts||in the remembrance||(of) Allah||No doubt||in the remembrance||(of) Allah||find satisfaction||the hearts

translations.text: Allazeena aamanoo Wa-tatma'innu quloobuhum bizikril laah; alaa bizikril laahi tatma'innul quloob

words.id: orang-orang yang||beriman||dan mereka beramal||kebajikan/saleh||kebahagiaan||bagi mereka||dan baik||tempat kembali
words.en: Those who||believed||and did||righteous deeds||blessedness||(is) for them||and a beautiful||place of return

translations.text: Allazeena aamanoo Wa-a'amilus saalihaati toobaa lahum Wa-husnu ma-aab

words.id: demikianlah||Kami telah mengutus kamu||pada||suatu umat||sungguh||telah berlalu||dari||sebelumnya||beberapa umat||supaya kamu membacakan||atas mereka||yang||Kami wahyukan||kepadamu||dan/padahal mereka||mereka kafir||dengan yang Maha Pengasih||katakanlah||Dia||Tuhanku||tidak ada||Tuhan||selain||Dia||kepadaNya||aku bertawakkal||dan kepadaNya||bertaubat
words.en: Thus||We have sent you||to||a nation||verily||have passed away||from||before it||nations||so that you might recite||to them||what||We revealed||to you||while they||disbelieve||in the Most Gracious||Say||He||(is) my Lord||(there is) no||god||except||Him||Upon Him||I put my trust||and to Him||(is) my return

translations.text: Kazaalika arsalnaaka feee ummatin qad khalat min qablihaaa umamul litatluwa alaihimul lazeee awhainaaa ilaika Wa-hum yakfuroona bir-Rahmaaan; qul Huwa Rabbee laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa alaihi tawakkaltu Wa-ilaihi mataab

words.id: dan jika||sekiranya||suatu bacaan||digoncangkan||dengannya||gunung-gunung||atau||dipotong/terbelah||dengannya||bumi||atau||dapat berbicara||dengannya||orang-orang yang  mati||bahkan||kepunyaan Allah||perkara/urusan||semuanya||tidakkah||mengetahui||orang-orang yang||(mereka)beriman||bahwa||seandainya||menghendaki||Allah||tentu Dia memberi petunjuk||manusia||semuanya||dan tidaklah||senantiasa||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||menimpa mereka||dengan sebab||mereka perbuat||bencana||atau||(ia)terjadi||dekat||dari||tempat kediaman mereka||sehingga||datang||janji||Allah||sesungguhnya||Allah||tidak||menyalahi||janji
words.en: And if||that was||any Quran||could be moved||by it||the mountains||or||could be cloven asunder||by it||the earth||or||could be made to speak||by it||the dead||Nay||with Allah||(is) the command||all||Then do not||know||those who||believe||that||if||had willed||Allah||surely, He would have guided||all||all of the mankind||And not||will cease||those who||disbelieve||to strike them||for what||they did||a disaster||or||it settles||close||from||their homes||until||comes||(the) promise||(of) Allah||Indeed||Allah||(will) not||fail||(in) the Promise

translations.text: Wa-law anna Quraanan suyyirat bihil jibaalu aw qutti'at bihil ardu aw kullima bihil mawtaa; bal lillaahil amru jamee'aa; afalam yai'asil lazeena aamanooo al law yashaaa 'ullaahu lahadan naasa jamee'aa; Wa-laa yazaalul lazeena kafaroo tuseebuhum bimaa sana'oo qaari'atun aw tahullu qareebam min daarihim hatta ya'tiya wa'dul laah; innal laaha laa yukhliful mee'aad

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||telah memperolok-olok||beberapa Rasul||dari||sebelum kamu||maka Aku memberi tangguh||bagi orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||kemudian||Aku binasakan mereka||maka bagaimana||adalah||siksaanKu
words.en: And certainly||were mocked||Messengers||from||before you||but I granted respite||to those who||disbelieved||then||I seized them||and how||was||My penalty

translations.text: Wa-laqadis tuhzi'a bi-Rusulim min qablika fa-amlaitu lillazeena kafaroo summa akhaztuhum fakaifa kaana iqaab

words.id: apakah yang||Dia||tegak/menjaga||atas/terhadap||setiap||diri||dengan apa||ia perbuat||dan mereka menjadikan||bagi Allah||beberapa sekutu||katakanlah||sebutkanlah mereka||atau apakah||kamu memberitahukan kepadaNya||dengan apa||tidak||diketahui||di||bumi||ataukah||dengan yang lahir||dari||perkataan||bahkan||dijadikan memandang baik||bagi orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||tipu daya mereka||dan mereka dihalangi||dari||jalan||dan barang siapa||menyesatkan||Allah||maka tidak||baginya||dari||memberi petunjuk
words.en: Is then He Who||(He)||(is) a Maintainer||of||every||soul||for what||it has earned||Yet they ascribe||to Allah||partners||Say||Name them||Or||(do) you inform Him||of what||not||He knows||in||the earth||or||of the apparent||of||the words||Nay||(is) made fair-seeming||to those who||disbelieve||their plotting||and they are hindered||from||the Path||And whoever||(by) Allah||Allah lets go astray||then not||for him||any||guide

translations.text: Afaman Huwa qaaa'imun 'alaa kulli nafsim bimaa kasabat; Wa-ja'aloo lil-laahi shurakaaa'a qul samoohum; am tunabbi'oona-hoo bimaa laa ya'lamu fil ardi; am bizaahirim minal qawl; bal zuyyina lillazeena kafaroo makruhum Wa-suddoo anis sabeel; Wa-mai yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad;

words.id: bagi mereka||azab||dalam||kehidupan||dunia||dan sesungguhnya azab||akhirat||lebih berat||dan tak ada||bagi mereka||dari/terhadap||Allah||dari||seorang pelindung
words.en: For them||(is) a punishment||in||the life||(of) the world||and surely the punishment||(of) the Hereafter||(is) harder||And not||for them||against||Allah||any||defender

translations.text: Lahum 'azaabun fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-la'azaabul Aakhirati ashaq, Wa-maa lahum minal laahi min waaq

words.id: perumpamaan||sorga||yang||dijanjikan||orang-orang yang takwa||mengalir||dari||bawahnya||sungai-sungai||buahnya||kekal||dan naungannya||itulah||tempat kesudahan||orang-orang yang||(mereka)bertakwa||dan tempat kesudahan||orang-orang kafir||neraka
words.en: The example||of Paradise||which||(is) promised||(to) the righteous||flows||from||underneath it||the rivers||Its food||(is) everlasting||and its shade||This||(is the) end||of those who||(are) righteous||and (the) end||(of) the disbelievers||(is) the Fire

translations.text: Masalul Jannatil latee wu'idal muttaqoona tajree min tahtihal anhaaru ukuluhaa daaa'imunw Wa-zilluhaa; tilka uqbal lazeenat taqaw Wa-'uqbal kafireenan Naar

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||Kami berikan kepada mereka||Kitab||mereka bergembira||dengan apa||diturunkan||kepadamu||dan dari/diantara||golongan||orang||mengingkari||sebagiannya||katakanlah||sesungguhnya hanyalah||aku diperintah||untuk||aku menyembah||Allah||dan tidak||aku mempersekutukan||dengan Dia||kepadaNya||aku menyeru||dan kepadaNya||tempat kembali
words.en: And those (to) whom||We have given them||the Book||rejoice||at what||has been revealed||to you||but among||the groups||(those) who||deny||a part of it||Say||Only||I have been commanded||that||I worship||Allah||and not||I associate partners||with Him||To Him||I call||and to Him||(is) my return

translations.text: Wallazeena aatainaa-humul Kitaaba yafrahoona bimaa unzila ilaika Wa-minal Ahzaabi mai yunkiru ba'dah; qul innamaa umirtu an a'budal laaha Wa-laaa ushrika bih; ilaihi ad'oo Wa-ilaihi maab

words.id: dan demikianlah||Kami telah menurunkannya||hukum/peraturan||bahasa Arab||dan seandainya||kamu mengikuti||hawa nafsu mereka||sesudah||apa||datang kepadamu||dari||pengetahuan||tidak ada||bagimu||dari||Allah||dari||seorang pelindung||dan tidak
words.en: And thus||We have revealed it||(to be) a judgment of authority||(in) Arabic||And if||you follow||their desires||after what||came to you||of||the knowledge||not||for you||against||Allah||any||protector||and not||defender

translations.text: Wa-kazaalika anzalnaahu hukman Arabiyyaa; Wa-la'init taba'ta ahwaaa-'ahum ba'da-maa jaaa'aka minal ilmi maa laka minal laahi minw waliyinw Wa-laa waaq

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||Kami telah mengutus||beberapa Rasul||dari||sebelum kamu||dan Kami jadikan/berikan||kepada mereka||isteri-isteri||dan keturunan||dan tidak||ada||bagi seorang Rasul||akan||mendatangkan||dengan suatu ayat||melainkan||dengan izin||Allah||bagi tiap-tiap||masa||Kitab
words.en: And certainly||We sent||Messengers||from||before you||and We made||for them||wives||and offspring||And not||was||for a Messenger||that||he comes||with a sign||except||by the leave||(of) Allah||For everything||(is) a time||prescribed

translations.text: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Rusulam min qablika Wa-ja'alnaa lahum azwaajanw Wa-zurriyyah; Wa-maa kaana lirasoolin aien ya'tiya bi-aayatin illaa bi-iznil laah; likulli ajalin kitaab

words.id: menghapus||Allah||apa||Dia kehendaki||dan Dia menetapkan||dan disisinya||Ummul||Kitab
words.en: (Is) eliminated||(by) Allah||what||He wills||and confirms||and with Him||(is) the Mother (of)||the Book

translations.text: Yamhul laahu maa yashaaa'u Wa-yusbitu Wa-'indahooo ummul Kitaab

words.id: dan jika||apa||Kami perlihatkan kepadamu||sebagian||yang||Kami ancamkan kepada mereka||atau||Kami wafatkan kamu||maka sesungguhnya hanyalah||atasmu/kewajiban||menyampaikan||dan atas Kami||menghisab
words.en: And whether||(what)||We show you||a part||(of) what||We have promised them||or||We cause you to die||so only||on you||(is) the conveyance||and on Us||(is) the reckoning

translations.text: Wa-im maa nurriyannaka ba'dal lazee na'iduhum aw nata-waffayannaka fa-innamaa alaikal balaaghu Wa-'alainal hisaab

words.id: ataukah tidak / bukan||mereka melihat||bahwasanya Kami||Kami mendatangi||bumi/daerah||Kami menguranginya||dari||tepi-tepinya||dan Allah||menetapkan||tidak||dapat menolak||bagi ketetapan hukumNya||dan Dia||Maha Cepat||perhitungan
words.en: Did not||they see||that We||come||(to) the land||reducing it||from||its borders||And Allah||judges||(there is) no||adjuster||(of) His Judgment||And He||(is) Swift||(in) the reckoning

translations.text: Awalam yaraw annaa na'til arda nanqusuhaa min atraafihaa; wallaahu yahkumu laa mu'aqqiba lihukmih; Wa-Huwa saree'ul hisaab

words.id: dan sungguh||telah mengadakan tipu daya||orang-orang yang||dari||sebelum mereka||maka bagi Allah||tipu daya||semuanya||Dia mengetahui||apa yang||diusahakan||setiap||diri||dan akan mengetahui||orang-orang||untuk siapa||kesudahan||tempat
words.en: And certainly||plotted||those who||(were) from||before them||but for Allah||(is) the plot||all||He knows||what||earns||every||soul||and will know||the disbelievers||for whom||(is) the final||the home

translations.text: Wa-qad makaral lazeena min qablihim falillaahil makru jamee'aa; ya'lamu maa taksibu kullu nafs; Wa-sa-ya'lamul kuffaaru liman 'uqbad daar

words.id: dan berkata||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||kamu bukan||dijadikan seorang Rasul||katakanlah||cukuplah||dengan Allah||menjadi saksi||antara aku||dan antara kamu||dan orang||disisinya/mempunyai||ilmu||Al Kitab
words.en: And say||those who||disbelieve||You are not||a Messenger||Say||Sufficient||(is) Allah||(as) a Witness||between me||and between you||and whoever||[he] has||knowledge||(of) the Book

translations.text: Wa-yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo lasta mursalaa; qul kafaa billaahi shaheedam bainee Wa-bainakum Wa-man indahoo ilmul Kitaab
